text: Qadian Assembly Constituency (Sl. No.: 6), also known as Qadian Assembly Constituency, is a Punjab Legislative Assembly constituency in Gurdaspur district, Punjab state, India. VVPAT will be used in Qadian in 2017 Assembly polls. ==Member of Legislative Assembly== * 2012: Charanjit Kaur Bajwa, Indian National Congress * 2017: Fatehjang Singh Bajwa, Indian National Congress ==Election results== ===2017=== ==References== Category:Assembly constituencies of Punjab, India Category:Gurdaspur district
title: Qadian Assembly Constituency
